name: .IPTHEME File Extension
summary: Learn about .IPTHEME files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by IconPackager, a program that allows users to create Windows icons; contains settings for an icon theme, including which packaged icons map to which Windows icons; used to save and load IconPackager themes.

content: IPTHEME files were replaced by newer .ICONPACKAGE files beginning with IconPackager version 5.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
